resources.string: Add new device

Open Dashlane on your new device and select
Log in with QR code
Return here, then scan the QR code on your new device
Follow the prompts on your new device to finish logging in

If QR code login: Return here to scan it

If Security Challenge login: Return here to validate request and complete the challenge
